channel.title: note on Youniverse
channel.description: Recent content in note on Youniverse

item.title: Install Golang From Source [Note]
item.description: Navigate to a proper base dir cd ~/golang Get the source for the bootstrap compiler # clone the go source repo into a folder, go1.4 in this case git clone git@github.com:golang/go.git go1.4 # navigate to the source folder cd go1.4 # checkout the release-branch.go1.4 branch git checkout release-branch.go1.4 Build the bootstrap compiler # navigate into the src directory cd src # set environment variable CGO_ENABLED to 0 CGO_ENABLED=0 # run make.

item.title: YAK8s 101: 1 | What is K8s? [Note]
item.description: What is K8s? | Kubernetes is a platform to orchestrate containers. It looks like this: ref: Kubernetes Documentation (Kubernetes Components). Accessed 8 Sep 2021, https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/components/
